hauska.grammarInfo: adjective, does not decline in the phrase 'hauska tutustua'

anteeksi.grammarInfo: interjection, used to get attention or apologize

examples: Aurinko paistaa ja on tosi lämmin.

lapsi.grammarInfo: noun, irregular declension (gen: lapsen, part: lasta)

käydä.grammarInfo: verb type 2, requires inessive case for location

jotain.grammarInfo: indefinite pronoun, partitive form of jokin

onnea.grammarInfo: noun, partitive form used in congratulations

examples: Ei kai se ole liian tulista?
